        Parameters:

        Parameters:
        area - of bit or of slice
        Returns:

      • getLiftPoint

        public static Vector2 getLiftPoint(java.awt.geom.Area area,
                                   double minRadius)
        Returns the best point to take that bit. By best we mean the point the closest to the barycenter of the bit and presenting enough material around for the sucker cup to work properly. It returns null if this bit cannot be lifted.
        Parameters:
        area - surface of bit
        minRadius - half of CraftConfig.suckerDiameter
        Returns:
        liftPoint. null if area is empty

        Parameters:
        area - target to extract
        Returns:
        segmentation of border
